sodium  <- menu %>%
  select(Category,
         Item,Sodium,
         Sodium....Daily.Value.) %>% 
  group_by(Category)


sodium_plot <- sodium %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Sodium,
             Category,
             fill = Category)) +
  geom_boxplot() + theme_classic() + ggtitle(\Menu Categories grouped by sodium content\")
